Name: Zipline
Overview:
DESCRIPTION
Zipline is a ShareX/file upload server that is easy to use, packed with features and can be setup in one command!

NOTES
• An external PostgreSQL database is required.
• Default credentials: administrator/password (user/pass). If, for whatever reason, you can't access with default credentials, run the cmd 'yarn prisma migrate deploy' from container's terminal. Then, try again.
• Zipline supports the use of an API to interact with. Check the documentation to know more.

VERSION
1.0 (2022-02-13)

@attributes.Name: SECURE
@attributes.Description: Whether or not to use https or not.

@attributes.Name: SECRET
@attributes.Description: Key string used for securing HTTPs connection. Generate your own string.

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_ROUTE
@attributes.Description: Which route uploads should be served on.

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_EMBED_ROUTE
@attributes.Description: Which route embed routes should be accessed via.

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_LENGTH
@attributes.Description: Length of randomly generated characters for uploads.

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_DIRECTORY
@attributes.Description: Which directory uploads should be stored to. (container's path)

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_USER_LIMIT
@attributes.Description: File size limit for normal users. (bytes)

@attributes.Name: UPLOADER_DISABLED_EXTS
@attributes.Description: An array of disabled extensions to be blocked when uploading files. (comma separated)

@attributes.Name: URLS_ROUTE
@attributes.Description: Which route urls should be served on.

@attributes.Name: URLS_LENGTH
@attributes.Description: Length of randomly generated characters for urls.
